means: 牺牲，献出( sacrifice的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Any hostages in the firing line would have been sacrificed.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何射击线上的人质就都会成为牺牲品。

sentence.Network_en: He sacrificed his own career so that his avaricious brother could succeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他牺牲了自己的事业，这样他贪婪的弟弟才能成功。

sentence.Network_en: Kitty Aldridge has sacrificed all for her first film.
sentence.Network_cn: 姬蒂·奥尔德里奇为自己的首部影片牺牲了一切。

PerfectNetExp.abs: He sacrificed his outstanding career to retain his dignity ., 他牺牲杰出的事业以维持他的尊严.
After 7 days, 14 days, 28 days, rats were sacrificed.在实验第7天、14天及28天,处死动物并分离甲状腺。
Asas everyone sacrificed a little love , this world will become a better human ., 只要人人都献出一点爱 , 这个世界会变成美好的人间.
this is my body , which is sacrificed for you ., 这是我的身体 , 是献祭给你的.

list.abs: and shed innocent blood , even the blood of and of their daughters , whom they sacrificed the idols of Canaan and the land polluted with blood .流无辜人的血，就是自己儿女的血，把他们祭祀迦南的偶像，那地就被血污秽了。
Tindeo是什么意思？_爱问知识人 ... 2. 勇于自我牺牲的，先见之明的（ self-sacrificing, foresighted） 3. 革新的（ innovatory）.
pelican - devoted and self - sacrificing charity ., 鹈鹕 － 奉献与自我牺牲的慈善精神.
the improvement of anode installation method in sacrificing anode protection design ., 牺牲阳极保护设计中阳极安装方法的改进.

entry.def: If you sacrifice something that is valuable or important, you give it up, usually to obtain something else for yourself or for other people.

example.ex: She sacrificed family life to her career...
Her husband's pride was a small thing to sacrifice for their children's security...
example.tran: 为了孩子们的安全，舍弃她丈夫的尊严不算什么。

entry.def: To sacrifice an animal or person means to kill them in a special religious ceremony as an offering to a god.

example.ex: Two white bulls were sacrificed and a feast was held.
example.tran: 献祭了两头白牛，并举行了盛宴。

auth_sentence.content: I'm here because you all sacrificed for me.

auth_sentence.content: One myth was that animals sacrificed their lives for them.
